description.zh-cn: 香港女歌手及演员，出生于台湾。她在1980年代至1990年代是香港乐坛的天后级歌手，曾连续四年夺得十大劲歌金曲“最受欢迎女歌星”奖，并于2011年获得香港乐坛最高荣誉金针奖。
description.en: A Hong Kong female singer and actress, born in Taiwan. A diva-level singer in the Hong Kong music scene from the 1980s to the 1990s, she won the 'Most Popular Female Singer' award at the JSG Awards for four consecutive years and received the Golden Needle Award, the highest honor in the Hong Kong music industry, in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手、演员及音乐创作人，叶蒨文的丈夫、粤语及声乐老师。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer, actor, and music composer. He is the husband, Cantonese tutor, and vocal coach of Sally Yeh.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的直辖市，叶蒨文的出生地。
description.en: A special municipality in Taiwan, birthplace of Sally Yeh.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的特别行政区，叶蒨文演艺事业发展的主要地点。
description.en: A special administrative region of the People's Republic of China, and the primary location of Sally Yeh's entertainment career.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲国家，叶蒨文幼时随家人移民于此并持有其国籍。
description.en: A country in North America where Sally Yeh immigrated with her family as a child and holds citizenship.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手及演员，林子祥的儿子，叶蒨文的继子。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actor, son of George Lam and stepson of Sally Yeh.

description.zh-cn: 第一届国民大会江苏省代表，叶蒨文的外公。
description.en: A representative for Jiangsu Province in the first National Assembly, and Sally Yeh's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 前华纳音乐(香港)总经理，林子祥的前妻。她安排林子祥担任叶蒨文的粤语老师，开启了叶蒨文在香港的歌唱事业。
description.en: Former general manager of Warner Music Hong Kong and ex-wife of George Lam. She arranged for Lam to become Sally Yeh's Cantonese tutor, which launched Yeh's singing career in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 台湾歌手及演员，叶蒨文的初恋对象。
description.en: A Taiwanese singer and actor, who was Sally Yeh's first love.

description.zh-cn: 台湾民歌音乐家，曾指导叶蒨文灌录其首张国语专辑。
description.en: A Taiwanese folk musician who guided Sally Yeh in recording her debut Mandarin album.

description.zh-cn: 香港导演，他引荐叶蒨文与林子祥合作，开启了她在香港发展的契机。
description.en: A Hong Kong director who recommended Sally Yeh to collaborate with George Lam, creating an opportunity for her development in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文在1984年至1998年间签约的唱片公司，是其事业巅峰期的主要合作方。
description.en: The record label Sally Yeh was signed to from 1984 to 1998, serving as her main partner during the peak of her career.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文在香港乐坛出道的首支粤语歌曲，由林子祥作曲。此曲推出后大受欢迎，为她打开了香港市场的知名度。
description.en: Sally Yeh's debut Cantonese song in the Hong Kong music scene, composed by George Lam. The song became very popular upon its release, establishing her fame in the Hong Kong market.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文的粤语专辑及其同名主打歌。该歌曲风靡全港，为她赢得了包括“金曲金奖”在内的多个乐坛大奖，将其歌唱事业推向高峰。
description.en: Sally Yeh's Cantonese album and its title track. The song became immensely popular throughout Hong Kong, winning her numerous music awards, including the 'Gold Song Gold Award', and propelling her singing career to its peak.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文的国语歌曲，在两岸三地广为流传，使她在台湾及整个华语市场大受欢迎，奠定了其天后地位。
description.en: A Mandarin song by Sally Yeh that became widely popular across the Greater China region, making her immensely popular in Taiwan and the broader Chinese-speaking market and establishing her status as a diva.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文于2002年复出时签约的唱片公司。
description.en: The record label Sally Yeh signed with upon her comeback in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆电影导演，曾在其电影《山河故人》中使用叶蒨文的歌曲《珍重》作为插曲。
description.en: A Chinese mainland film director who used Sally Yeh's song 'Treasure' as an insert song in his film 'Mountains May Depart'.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文出生时所持有的国籍。
description.en: The nationality Sally Yeh held at birth.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文与林子祥于1996年7月17日结婚。
description.en: Sally Yeh and George Lam married on July 17, 1996.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代初，林子祥担任叶蒨文的粤语和声乐老师。
description.en: In the early 1980s, George Lam served as Sally Yeh's Cantonese and vocal coach.

description.zh-cn: 费翔是叶蒨文的初恋对象，两人于1980年初相恋，但恋情因费翔母亲反对而告终。
description.en: Kris Phillips was Sally Yeh's first love. They fell in love in early 1980, but the relationship ended due to opposition from Phillips' mother.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文于1961年9月30日出生于台湾台北市。
description.en: Sally Yeh was born in Taipei, Taiwan on September 30, 1961.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文幼时随家人移民加拿大，并持有该国国籍。
description.en: Sally Yeh immigrated to Canada with her family as a child and holds Canadian citizenship.

description.zh-cn: 叶蒨文出生于台湾，持有中华民国国籍。
description.en: Sally Yeh was born in Taiwan and holds Republic of China citizenship.

description.zh-cn: 袁其烱是叶蒨文的外公。
description.en: Yuan Qijiong is Sally Yeh's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 林德信是叶蒨文的继子。
description.en: Alex Lam is Sally Yeh's stepson.

description.zh-cn: 林德信是林子祥的儿子。
description.en: Alex Lam is the son of George Lam.

description.zh-cn: 吴正元是林子祥的前妻，两人于1994年离婚。
description.en: Ng Ching-Yuen is George Lam's ex-wife; they divorced in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 时任华纳音乐(香港)总经理的吴正元安排其丈夫林子祥担任叶蒨文的粤语和声乐老师，开启了叶蒨文在香港的歌唱事业。
description.en: As the general manager of Warner Music Hong Kong, Ng Ching-Yuen arranged for her husband George Lam to be Sally Yeh's Cantonese and vocal coach, which launched Yeh's singing career in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1980年，李泰祥指导叶蒨文灌录其首张国语专辑《春天的浮雕》，帮助其作为歌手出道。
description.en: In 1980, Li Tai-hsiang guided Sally Yeh in recording her debut Mandarin album 'Spring's Relief Sculpture', helping her debut as a singer.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，杨凡引荐叶蒨文与林子祥合唱歌曲《重逢》，开启了她在香港发展的契机。
description.en: In 1983, Yonfan introduced Sally Yeh to collaborate with George Lam on the song 'Reunion', creating an opportunity for her career development in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 林子祥为叶蒨文创作了其首支粤语歌曲《零时十分》，并担任其多张专辑的监制，对她在香港乐坛的成功起到了关键推动作用。
description.en: George Lam composed Sally Yeh's first Cantonese song 'Ten Past Midnight' and served as the producer for several of her albums, playing a key role in her success in the Hong Kong music industry.

description.zh-cn: 作为叶蒨文在香港乐坛出道的首支粤语歌曲，此曲大受欢迎，为其打开了香港市场的知名度，并获得十大劲歌金曲奖。
description.en: As Sally Yeh's debut Cantonese song in the Hong Kong music scene, this track became highly popular, establishing her fame in the Hong Kong market and winning a Top Ten JSG Award.

description.zh-cn: 此歌曲风靡全港，为叶蒨文赢得了包括十大劲歌金曲“金曲金奖”在内的12项乐坛大奖，将其歌唱事业推向全新高峰。
description.en: This song became immensely popular throughout Hong Kong, winning Sally Yeh 12 music awards, including the JSG Gold Song Gold Award, and propelling her singing career to a new peak.

description.zh-cn: 此曲随电视剧《京城四少》播出后在两岸三地广为流传，使叶蒨文在台湾及整个华语市场声名大噪，奠定了其华语歌坛天后级的地位。
description.en: Following its broadcast with the TV series 'The Four Brothers of Peking', this song became widely popular across the Greater China region, greatly boosting Sally Yeh's fame in Taiwan and the broader Chinese-speaking market, and establishing her status as a diva in the Mandopop scene.

description.zh-cn: 导演贾樟柯表示叶蒨文的歌曲对他而言是一个时代的象征，并将其歌曲《珍重》用于电影《山河故人》中以表达情感。
description.en: Director Jia Zhangke stated that Sally Yeh's songs symbolize an era for him and used her song 'Treasure' in his film 'Mountains May Depart' to express emotion.
